name: Oblivion (Tony LindoRock)
description:
Oblivion

It's an experimental therapy

This game was made as the final project for my game prototyping course.

You will play as a memoryless patient exploring and navigating 8 orange, isolated rooms. With throwable giant fruit and vegetables and strange puzzles, you will need to think and consider your best solution. 

Features
  • Simple, minimal environment
  • Stylized models and particle effect
  • Picking up and throwing!
  • Dodge ball like combat
